```{r}
df.try <- try({ 
  df <- get_variable(x, this_var, time_range = time_range)

this_dygraph <- 
  dygraph_variable(df,
                   pixheight = pixheight, pixwidth = pixwidth, 
                   axisLabelWidth = axisLabelWidth,
                   group = "templateGroup")
if (this_var == last(list_var)) {
  this_dygraph <-
    this_dygraph %>% dyRangeSelector()
}
})
if (!inherits(df.try, "try-error")) {
 show(this_dygraph)
}
```
